title: Ivanti Endpoint Manager GetFilePath Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Ivanti Endpoint Manager. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the implementation of the GetFilePath method. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied path prior to using it in file operations. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the service account.
addtionnal_details: Ivanti has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://forums.ivanti.com/s/article/Security-Advisory-EPM-November-2024-for-EPM-2024-and-EPM-2022
timeline:
2024-08-22 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2024-11-13 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2024-11-13 - Advisory Updated
